Preserve the Tiger

Brand identity / site design

Preserve the Tiger is a clothing company that was started by an Ottawa local to support the preservation of wild tigers worldwide. I built their branding and website, as well as their products, to attract a young demographic to the cause of helping tigers while also getting them excited about the streetwear based garments they sell. We're helping save tigers and looking good doing it. Check out the live website

© 2016 Rob O'Donnell
